products.name: Espresso
products.description: Espresso is a shot of concentrated coffee made by applying high pressure to boiling water to pass through finely-ground coffee beans.

products.name: Americano
products.description: Americano is made by mixing espresso with hot water, offering a milder flavor compared to pure espresso.

products.name: Latte
products.description: Latte is a coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, offering a creamy and mild flavor.

products.name: Cappuccino
products.description: A cappuccino consists of equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam, often topped with cocoa powder.

products.name: Café au Lait
products.description: Café au Lait is made with brewed coffee and steamed milk, offering a smooth and mild flavor.

products.name: Mocha
products.description: Mocha combines espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup, topped with milk foam or whipped cream.

products.name: Macchiato
products.description: Macchiato is made with espresso and a small amount of steamed milk, offering a strong and creamy flavor.

products.name: Affogato
products.description: Affogato is made by pouring hot espresso over vanilla ice cream, creating a delicious dessert drink.

products.name: Hot Chocolate
products.description: Hot Chocolate is made with steamed milk and chocolate, topped with whipped cream and chocolate sprinkles.

products.name: Hot Tea
products.description: Hot Tea is available in a variety of flavors, including black, green, and herbal options.

products.name: Herbal Tea
products.description: Herbal Tea offers a range of soothing flavors such as chamomile, peppermint, and ginger.

products.name: Flat White
products.description: Flat White is made with espresso and microfoam, offering a rich, velvety texture.

products.name: Irish Coffee
products.description: Irish Coffee is a cocktail made with hot coffee, Irish whiskey, sugar, and topped with cream.

products.name: Ristretto
products.description: Ristretto is a short shot of espresso made with less water, offering a sweeter and more intense flavor.

products.name: Cortado
products.description: Cortado is a beverage made with equal parts espresso and warm milk, reducing acidity and enhancing the coffee's flavor.

products.name: Turkish Coffee
products.description: Turkish Coffee is a strong, thick coffee made by boiling finely ground coffee beans in water and sugar.

products.name: Vienna Coffee
products.description: Vienna Coffee is made with strong black coffee and whipped cream, offering a rich and creamy experience.

products.name: Espresso Con Panna
products.description: Espresso Con Panna is a shot of espresso topped with a dollop of whipped cream, balancing the strong coffee with creamy sweetness.

products.name: Caramel Macchiato
products.description: Caramel Macchiato is made with espresso, steamed milk, and caramel syrup, topped with milk foam and caramel drizzle.

products.name: Matcha Latte
products.description: Matcha Latte is made with matcha green tea powder, steamed milk, and a touch of sweetener, offering a vibrant and earthy flavor.

products.name: Chai Latte
products.description: Chai Latte is made with spiced tea concentrate and steamed milk, offering a warm and spicy flavor.

products.name: Café Bombón
products.description: Café Bombón is a Spanish coffee drink made with espresso and sweetened condensed milk, creating a rich and sweet flavor.

products.name: Doppio
products.description: Doppio is a double shot of espresso, offering a stronger and more intense coffee experience.

products.name: Red Eye
products.description: Red Eye is a coffee drink made by combining a shot of espresso with brewed coffee, offering an extra caffeine kick.

products.name: Mocha Macchiato
products.description: Mocha Macchiato is made with espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup, topped with milk foam and a drizzle of chocolate.

products.name: Cold Brew
products.description: Cold brew coffee is made by steeping coarsely ground coffee beans in cold water for an extended period, resulting in a smooth, less acidic beverage.

products.name: Iced Latte
products.description: Iced Latte is made with espresso and cold milk, served over ice for a refreshing coffee experience.

products.name: Iced Mocha
products.description: Iced Mocha is a cold coffee drink made with espresso, cold milk, and chocolate syrup, served over ice and topped with whipped cream.

products.name: Iced Americano
products.description: Iced Americano is a simple and refreshing coffee drink made by diluting espresso with cold water and serving it over ice.

products.name: Iced Cappuccino
products.description: Iced Cappuccino is a chilled version of the classic cappuccino, made with espresso, cold milk, and milk foam, served over ice.

products.name: Iced Chai Latte
products.description: Iced Chai Latte is made with spiced tea concentrate and cold milk, served over ice for a refreshing and flavorful drink.

products.name: Iced Matcha Latte
products.description: Iced Matcha Latte is made with matcha green tea powder, cold milk, and ice, offering a vibrant and refreshing drink.

products.name: Iced Caramel Macchiato
products.description: Iced Caramel Macchiato is made with espresso, cold milk, vanilla syrup, and caramel drizzle, served over ice.

products.name: Iced Flat White
products.description: Iced Flat White is a smooth and velvety coffee drink made with espresso and cold microfoam milk, served over ice.

products.name: Lemonade
products.description: Lemonade is a classic summer drink made with freshly squeezed lemon juice, sugar, and water, served over ice.

products.name: Iced Green Tea
products.description: Iced Green Tea is a refreshing and light drink made with brewed green tea and served over ice.

products.name: Iced Black Tea
products.description: Iced Black Tea is a robust and flavorful drink made with brewed black tea and served over ice.

products.name: Iced Herbal Tea
products.description: Iced Herbal Tea is a refreshing non-caffeinated drink made with herbal tea and served over ice. We offer flavors like hibiscus, peppermint, and chamomile.

products.name: Iced Vanilla Latte
products.description: Iced Vanilla Latte is made with espresso, cold milk, and vanilla syrup, served over ice for a sweet and creamy drink.

products.name: Iced Coffee
products.description: Iced Coffee is a simple and classic drink made by brewing coffee and chilling it before serving over ice.

products.name: Coconut Water
products.description: Coconut Water is a hydrating and naturally sweet drink, perfect for a refreshing treat on a hot day.

products.name: Arnold Palmer
products.description: Arnold Palmer is a refreshing drink made by mixing lemonade and iced tea, served over ice.

products.name: Berry Smoothie
products.description: Berry Smoothie is made with a blend of mixed berries, yogurt, and juice, creating a sweet and tart drink.

products.name: Mango Smoothie
products.description: Mango Smoothie is made with fresh mango, yogurt, and juice, blended to create a creamy and tropical drink.

products.name: Peach Iced Tea
products.description: Peach Iced Tea is a sweet and fruity drink made with brewed tea and peach syrup, served over ice.

products.name: Watermelon Juice
products.description: Watermelon Juice is a refreshing and hydrating drink made with freshly blended watermelon, perfect for hot days.

products.name: Iced Macchiato
products.description: Iced Macchiato is a strong coffee drink made with espresso and a small amount of cold milk, served over ice.

products.name: Tonic Espresso
products.description: Tonic Espresso is a refreshing and unique drink made with espresso and tonic water, served over ice.

products.name: Lime Soda
products.description: Lime Soda is a fizzy and tangy drink made with fresh lime juice, soda water, and a touch of sugar, served over ice.

products.name: Iced White Mocha
products.description: Iced White Mocha is a cold coffee drink made with espresso, cold milk, and white chocolate syrup, served over ice and topped with whipped cream.

products.name: Croissant
products.description: A classic buttery and flaky French pastry, perfect for pairing with coffee.

products.name: Chocolate Croissant
products.description: A rich and indulgent croissant filled with chocolate, perfect for a sweet treat.

products.name: Blueberry Muffin
products.description: A moist and fluffy muffin loaded with fresh blueberries, a perfect breakfast or snack.

products.name: Almond Croissant
products.description: A croissant filled with almond paste and topped with sliced almonds, offering a sweet and nutty flavor.

products.name: Cinnamon Roll
products.description: A soft and sweet roll filled with cinnamon and sugar, topped with cream cheese icing.

products.name: Apple Turnover
products.description: A flaky pastry filled with spiced apple filling, perfect for a warm and comforting treat.

products.name: Chocolate Chip Muffin
products.description: A moist and fluffy muffin filled with chocolate chips, ideal for chocolate lovers.

products.name: Banana Bread
products.description: A rich and moist bread made with ripe bananas, perfect for a quick snack or breakfast.

products.name: Raspberry Danish
products.description: A flaky pastry topped with raspberry jam and drizzled with icing, offering a sweet and tangy flavor.

products.name: Lemon Poppy Seed Muffin
products.description: A light and zesty muffin made with fresh lemon juice and poppy seeds, perfect for a refreshing treat.

products.name: Scone
products.description: A classic British pastry that is slightly sweet and crumbly, often served with jam and cream.

products.name: Pumpkin Bread
products.description: A spiced and moist bread made with pumpkin puree, perfect for autumn or anytime you want a cozy treat.

products.name: Cheese Danish
products.description: A rich and creamy Danish pastry filled with sweetened cream cheese and topped with a light glaze.

products.name: Strawberry Tart
products.description: A buttery tart crust filled with pastry cream and topped with fresh strawberries, offering a sweet and fruity flavor.

products.name: Chocolate Eclair
products.description: A light pastry filled with creamy custard and topped with a rich chocolate glaze, perfect for a decadent treat.

products.name: Baklava
products.description: A rich and sweet pastry made of layers of filo filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with honey, offering a taste of the Mediterranean.

products.name: Red Velvet Cupcake
products.description: A classic cupcake with a hint of cocoa and a vibrant red color, topped with cream cheese frosting.

products.name: Macaron
products.description: A delicate French pastry made with almond flour and filled with flavored ganache, available in a variety of flavors.

products.name: Lemon Bar
products.description: A tart and sweet dessert bar made with a buttery shortbread crust and a lemony filling, dusted with powdered sugar.

products.name: Coconut Macaroon
products.description: A sweet and chewy treat made with shredded coconut, often dipped in chocolate.

products.name: Opera Cake

products.name: Pecan Pie Bar
products.description: A sweet and nutty bar made with a buttery shortbread crust and topped with a rich pecan filling.

products.name: Vanilla Bean Scone
products.description: A tender and slightly sweet scone infused with vanilla bean, perfect for pairing with tea.

products.name: Chocolate Brownie
products.description: A rich and fudgy brownie made with dark chocolate, perfect for satisfying a sweet tooth.

products.name: Peach Cobbler
products.description: A warm and comforting dessert made with sweet peaches and a buttery biscuit topping, perfect for a cozy treat.

products.name: Turkey Club Sandwich
products.description: A classic sandwich made with roasted turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on toasted bread.

products.name: Ham and Cheese Sandwich
products.description: A simple and satisfying sandwich made with ham, cheese, lettuce, and mustard on whole grain bread.

products.name: Chicken Caesar Wrap

products.name: Caprese Sandwich
products.description: A fresh and flavorful sandwich made with mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and balsamic glaze on ciabatta bread.

products.name: BLT Sandwich
products.description: A classic sandwich made with crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on toasted bread.

products.name: Tuna Salad Sandwich
products.description: A classic sandwich made with tuna salad, lettuce, and tomato on whole wheat bread.

products.name: Chicken Pesto Panini

products.name: Egg Salad Sandwich
products.description: A simple and creamy sandwich made with egg salad, lettuce, and chives on soft white bread.

products.name: Veggie Hummus Wrap
products.description: A healthy and flavorful wrap made with hummus, roasted vegetables, spinach, and feta cheese in a whole wheat tortilla.

products.name: Italian Sub

products.name: Pulled Pork Sandwich

products.name: Avocado Toast
products.description: A trendy and nutritious option made with mashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a sprinkle of chili flakes on whole grain toast.

products.name: Philly Cheesesteak
products.description: A classic sandwich made with thinly sliced beef, sautéed onions, peppers, and melted cheese on a hoagie roll.

products.name: Turkey Cranberry Sandwich
products.description: A seasonal favorite made with roasted turkey, cranberry sauce, and stuffing on multigrain bread.

products.name: BBQ Chicken Sandwich
products.description: A tangy and sweet sandwich made with grilled chicken, barbecue sauce, and pickles on a toasted bun.

products.name: Mozzarella and Tomato Panini
products.description: A vegetarian option made with fresh mozzarella, tomato, basil, and balsamic glaze pressed on ciabatta bread.

products.name: Smoked Salmon Bagel
products.description: A classic bagel sandwich made with smoked salmon, cream cheese, red onion, and capers on a toasted bagel.

products.name: Mediterranean Veggie Sandwich
products.description: A fresh and healthy sandwich made with hummus, cucumber, tomato, red onion, feta, and spinach on whole wheat bread.

products.name: Egg and Bacon Sandwich

products.name: Cuban Sandwich
